alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Chouteau; Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 2:00PM MDT until June 05 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Fergus County in central Montana... Southwestern Blaine County in north central Montana... East central Chouteau County in north central Montana... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 200 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 18 miles northwest of Winifred, or 36 miles southeast of Big Sandy, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Judith Landing and Iliad. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
